name: The Lawnmower Man
overview: Prepare to enter the mind-blowing world of virtual reality! In the shadowy research agency known as "The Shop", Dr. Angelo has created a monster by using the simple Jobe in his virtual reality intelligence-expanding experiments. Now the superhuman CyberJobe is threatening to dominate the planet by controlling the worldwide computer network! You must take the role of Dr. Angelo or his friend Carla and destroy "The Shop" before CyberJobe and his cohorts take control. Put your intellect and strength to the test through a variety of 3D, flying, puzzle and platform levels, in the ultimate battle between good and evil!
